verses.verse: הַ֥לְלוּ <WH1984> Hal-lu Praise יָ֨הּ׀ <WH3050> yah ye the LORD אַשְׁרֵי־ <WH835> 'ash-rei- Blessed אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> 'ish [is] the man יָרֵ֣א <WH3372> ya-Re [that] feareth אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD בְּ֝מִצְוֹתָ֗יו <WH4687> be-mitz-vo-Tav, in his commandments חָפֵ֥ץ <WH2654> cha-Fetz [that] delighteth מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> me-'Od. greatly

גִּבּ֣וֹר <WH1368> gib-Bor shall be mighty בָּ֭אָרֶץ <WH776> Ba-'a-retz upon earth יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> zar-'O; His seed דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> Dor the generation יְשָׁרִ֣ים <WH3477> ye-sha-Rim of the upright יְבֹרָֽךְ׃ <WH1288> ye-vo-Rach. shall be blessed

הוֹן־ <WH1952> hon- Wealth וָעֹ֥שֶׁר <WH6239> va-'O-sher and riches בְּבֵית֑וֹ <WH1004> be-vei-To; [shall be] in his house וְ֝צִדְקָת֗וֹ <WH6666> ve-tzid-ka-To, and his righteousness עֹמֶ֥דֶת <WH5975> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַֽד׃ <WH5703> la-'Ad. for ever

זָ֘רַ֤ח <WH2224> za-Rach there ariseth בַּחֹ֣שֶׁךְ <WH2822> ba-Cho-shech in the darkness א֭וֹר <WH216> or light לַיְשָׁרִ֑ים <WH3477> lay-sha-Rim; Unto the upright חַנּ֖וּן <WH2587> chan-Nun [he is] gracious וְרַח֣וּם <WH7349> ve-ra-Chum and full of compassion וְצַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> ve-tzad-Dik. and righteous

טֽוֹב־ <WH2896> tov- A good אִ֭ישׁ <WH376> 'ish man חוֹנֵ֣ן <WH2603> cho-Nen sheweth favour וּמַלְוֶ֑ה <WH3867> u-mal-Veh; and lendeth יְכַלְכֵּ֖ל <WH3557> ye-chal-Kel he will guide דְּבָרָ֣יו <WH1697> de-va-Rav his affairs בְּמִשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> be-mish-Pat. with discretion

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for לְעוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> le-'o-Lam for ever לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not יִמּ֑וֹט <WH4131> yim-Mot; Surely he shall not be moved לְזֵ֥כֶר <WH2143> le-Ze-cher remembrance ע֝וֹלָ֗ם <WH5769> o-Lam, shall be in everlasting יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> tzad-Dik. the righteous

מִשְּׁמוּעָ֣ה <WH8052> mish-she-mu-'Ah tidings רָ֭עָה <WH7451> Ra-'ah of evil לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo He will not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> yi-Ra; He shall not be afraid נָכ֥וֹן <WH3559> na-Chon is fixed לִ֝בּ֗וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo, his heart בָּטֻ֥חַ <WH982> ba-Tu-ach trusting בַּיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. in the LORD

סָמ֣וּךְ <WH5564> sa-Much [is] established לִ֭בּוֹ <WH3820> lib-bo His heart לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo he will not יִירָ֑א <WH3372> yi-Ra; he shall not be afraid עַ֖ד <WH5704> 'ad Until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- he יִרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh until he see בְצָרָֽיו׃ <WH6862> ve-tza-Rav. [his desire] upon his enemies

פִּזַּ֤ר׀ <WH6340> piz-Zar He hath dispersed נָ֘תַ֤ן <WH5414> na-Tan he hath given לָאֶבְיוֹנִ֗ים <WH34> la-'ev-yo-Nim, to the poor צִ֭דְקָתוֹ <WH6666> tzid-ka-to his righteousness עֹמֶ֣דֶת <WH5975> 'o-Me-det endureth לָעַ֑ד <WH5703> la-'Ad; for ever קַ֝רְנ֗וֹ <WH7161> kar-No, his horn תָּר֥וּם <WH7311> ta-Rum shall be exalted בְּכָבֽוֹד׃ <WH3519> be-cha-Vod. with honour

רָ֘שָׁ֤ע <WH7563> ra-Sha' The wicked יִרְאֶ֨ה׀ <WH7200> yir-'Eh shall see וְכָעָ֗ס <WH3707> ve-cha-'As, [it] and be grieved שִׁנָּ֣יו <WH8127> shin-Nav with his teeth יַחֲרֹ֣ק <WH2786> ya-cha-Rok he shall gnash וְנָמָ֑ס <WH4549> ve-na-Mas; and melt away תַּאֲוַ֖ת <WH8378> ta-'a-Vat the desire רְשָׁעִ֣ים <WH7563> re-sha-'Im of the wicked תֹּאבֵֽד׃ <WH6> to-Ved. shall perish
